column2: Job Description:  Service Delivery Manager (Governance and Compliance)  We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Service Delivery Manager to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for overseeing service delivery operations with a focus on governance and compliance within our IT company. The primary focus of this role is to establish governance structures, policies, and practices that ensure seamless service delivery while proactively identifying and addressing gaps in the system. A capable professional to take on a dedicated role in building and sustaining an effective IT governance framework between two companies (Vendor-Client).  Key Responsibilities: 1. Governance Framework Development: Lead the development and implementation of IT governance frameworks tailored to the specific need between the two companies. Define governance structures, roles, and responsibilities to ensure accountability and transparency. Establish processes for not limiting to decision-making, data security, access control, risk management, and compliance with regulatory requirements. 2. Service Delivery Management: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure adherence to the newly developed governance framework. Implement mechanisms for continuous monitoring and evaluation of service delivery processes. Identify and address gaps in governance and service delivery, fostering a culture of continuous improvement. 3. Gap Identification and Resolution: Conduct regular assessments to identify governance gaps and areas for improvement. Collaborate with stakeholders to address identified gaps and implement corrective actions. Drive a culture of continuous improvement by iterating on governance processes based on feedback and lessons learned. 4. Stakeholder Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for governance-related matters between the two companies. Facilitate communication and collaboration among stakeholders to ensure alignment with governance objectives. Provide regular updates on governance initiatives and progress to senior management. 5. KPI Development and Monitoring: Define and establish KPIs for service delivery, governance, and compliance. Monitor KPIs regularly to track performance and identify areas for improvement. Implement corrective actions and process enhancements to achieve KPI targets. 6. Risk Management: Identify potential risks related to governance gaps and develop mitigation strategies. Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards. Implement controls to minimize operational disruptions and security vulnerabilities. 7. Incident Reporting: Establish incident response procedures and protocols to promptly detect, assess, and address security incidents, breaches, or disruptions. Coordinate incident response efforts, including investigation, containment, and resolution, in collaboration with relevant stakeholders. Prepare comprehensive incident reports documenting the incident timeline, impact assessment, and remediation actions taken. 8. SLA Achievement: Define clear Service Level Agreements (SLAs) in consultation with clients and stakeholders, outlining performance metrics, response times, and service quality benchmarks. Monitor SLA performance metrics and Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to track service delivery efficiency and effectiveness. Collaborate with internal teams to address SLA deviations, implement corrective actions, and ensure service excellence. Strong understanding of relevant regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, SOX) and industry standards (e.g., ISO 27001). Strong understanding of ITIL (Information Technology Infrastructure Library) principles and best practices. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with internal and external stakeholders. Analytical mindset with the ability to identify and address complex governance and compliance issues. Demonstrated leadership abilities and experience in managing cross-functional teams.
